document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2007-06
document.heading: AN INTERIM URGENCY ORDINANCE OF THE CITY COUNCIL OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON PLACING A MORATORIUM ON THE ESTABLISHMENT AND OPERATION OF ADULT BUSINESSES WITHIN THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON BY IMPOSING A MORATORIUM ON THE RECEIPT, PROCESSING, OR APPROVAL OF APPLICATIONS FOR BUSINESS LICENSES OR FOR PERMITS FOR ADULT ENTERTAINMENT BUSINESSES IN THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON
